price: Bu suretle Allah, dünya hayatında onlara rezilliği tattırdı. Ahiret azabı daha büyüktür. Keşke bunu bilselerdi!
arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-adhāqahumu al-lahu al-khiz'ya fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
